p.d: This studio concert by the Byrds (Roger McGuinn, Gene Clark, David Crosby, Chris Hillman, Michael Clarke) features some of their biggest hits. The setlist includes "Lover of the Bayou," "You ain't goin' nowhere," "Truck Stop Girl," "Baby What You Want Me to Do," "Soldier's Joy," "Pretty Boy Floyd," "Take a Whiff on Me," "Jesus is Just Alright," and "Mr Spaceman."
